attributes.action: Provide Ukraine's new government with all necessary means
attributes.additional_details: Provide Ukraine's new government with all necessary means, including the provision of military forces, to protect Ukraine's territorial integrity in accordance with the Budapest Memorandum. We have a legal and moral duty to do this, and Russia will not stop with Crimea, they won't even stop with Ukraine. Putin clearly wants a fight - let's give him one sooner rather than later and send a message Europe will not tolerate his brand of corrupt cronyism.
